description:
If you're a huge hockey fan, this is the app for you! Hockey Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores for all 30 professional teams.  It’s like getting 30 apps in one!  
You can easily switch between teams to get the latest info for each one.  Included in the app are 

Anaheim, Atlanta, Boston, Buffalo, Calgary, Carolina, Chicago, Colorado, Columbus, Dallas, Detroit, Edmonton, Florida, Los Angeles, Minnesota, Montreal, Nashville, New Jersey, New York I, New York R, Ottawa, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, St. Louis, Tampa Bay, Toronto, Vancouver and Washington.


Each team has its own chat room where you can discuss the latest news and highlights with other fans.  Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with your favourite hockey teams. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Hockey Fans today!
